0.1.name: wordpress/wp-smtp-contact-form
0.1.description:
WP SMTP Contact Form is a wordpress plugin based upon WP Contact Form.

Instead of using the php default mail function (which probably uses sendmail), WP SMTP Contact Form uses PEAR:Mail to send mail using an external SMTP server.
